attributes.action: Increase financing and improve investment in Regenerative Medicine to treat age-related diseases and ageing
attributes.additional_details:
Current financing, investment architecture, infrastructure, research and development of Regenerative Medicine as a medical technology to regenerate, rejuvenate and replace ageing tissue and organs is not sufficient to adequately deal with the ageing population crisis and slow and reverse the ageing process.

The government should take multiple measures in funding and policy to create the environment and infrastructure needed to adequately deal with the ageing population crises.
